name: UFGRemoteCallObject

methods.name: IsSupportedForNetworking
methods.comment: Mark this class as supported for networking

methods.name: GetFunctionCallspace
methods.comment: This is overloaded so that we can call Server/Client functions in this object by using the Callspace of the outer PlayerController.

methods.name: CallRemoteFunction
methods.comment: This is overloaded so that we can call Server/Client functions in this object by using the NetDriver of the outer PlayerController.

methods.name: GetGameState
methods.comment: Helper function to get the game state. Can't be done in BluePrint since the GetGameState function hides it world context pin

methods.name: GetOuterFGPlayerController
methods.comment: Returns the cast outer as a FGPlayerControlelr
